::DarkMouse::

*She hears that faint whistle again and looks up.  She tries to dodge the 
disk but wasn't fast enough.  It slices through her side ripping down to her 
metal ribs.  It slices through part of one of her ribs and she falls in 
agony.  Fluid gushing out of her side and from her shoulder.  She falls to 
the ground and lays on her back looking up at the sky.  She vision getting 
hazey.  She raises her arm and fires on
Manterror.*

"Today is a good day to die.  At least I die a Maximal and not a Preacon."





-------Original Message-------------
>From: KSLawdogg@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Thu, 15 Jun 2000 10:46:11 EDT
>>
>Ramhorn/Mosquitor/Ramhorn/Counter Punch/Injector/Manterror:
>
>
>Ramhorn yelled, jumping to the left, a "glob" of acid hitting him in the 
>left
>side.  Hitting the ground, he cried out in pain, rolling to take away some 
>of
>the pain, facing down so it didn't continue to burn inwardly of him.
>
>----
>
>Counter Punch laughed as the Maximal (Triceradon) had fallen from his 
>attack.
>  Beginning to turn, numerous shots sent him flying back 5 feet due to his
>unstable standing (from having one foot up, and one foot down while 
>walking).
>
>----
>
>Injector had seen Counter Punch fall from Stegotron's attacks.  Raising his
>optics so Stegotron was in perfect view, he fired a single green optic 
>blast
>at Stegotron's chest, simultaneously firing three stinger missiles from his
>hand-held launcher.
>
>----
>
>Manterror was laughing, but stumbled back, falling on his butt when Striker
>opened fire.  <Double Punch, get your skid plate over here!  To many 
>Maximals
>are arriving>
>
>~Acknowledged~ Double Punch replied, getting out the bridge of the Pred 
>ship
>and charging off towards Manterror's location, cloaking into his stealth 
>mode.
>
>Manterror saw Striker turn to open fire at Mosquitor.  "Perfect." his
>cracking into a smile.  Raising his arms, he fired two ion disks at 
>Striker's
>side.  Simultaneously firing a single ion disk at Dark Mouse's torso (the
>torso counts as the head, chest, and abdomen, abdomen is the region of the
>body that the stomach is in).
